title: Subject Guides: COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Resources: Henry Ford Health Publications on COVID-19
author: JoAnn Krzeminski
description: This guide gathers together timely research and resources for healthcare professionals and support staff on the topic of COVID-19. This page contains an ongoing and exhaustive bibliography of publications by Henry Ford Health authors on the topic of the COVID-19 pandemic.
cleaned_text: This bibliography contains journal articles and conference abstracts written by Henry Ford Health authors and researchers on the topic of COVID-19, SARS-Cov2, and the coronavirus pandemic. Publications are listed by department, then by publication date. Henry Ford Health authors are in bold. New publications are routinely added to this list. Click "Full Text" or "Request Article" hyperlinks to access. Please contact [Steven Moore](mailto:smoore31@hfhs.org) with any questions. This RSS feed updates with the newest journal articles from Henry Ford Health authors on the topic of COVID-19. To create your own RSS, visit the [Alerts page](https://scholarlycommons.henryford.com/covid-19_articles/announcements.html) in Scholarly Commons.
